sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useContext, useState } from "react"; import { ProductContext } from "./ProductContext"; import AddProductModal from "./AddProductModal"; import EditProductModal from "./EditProductModal"; import { AllProduct, ProductTable } from './ProductTable'; const ProductMenu = (props) => { const { data, dispatch } = useContext(ProductContext); const [dropdown, setDropdown] = useState(false); return (
{/* It's open the add product modal */} dispatch({ type: "addProductModal", payload: true }) } className="rounded-full cursor-pointer p-2 bg-gray-800 flex items-center text-gray-100 text-sm font-semibold uppercase" > Add Product
Filter
AllProduct("All", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > All AllProduct( "Not processed", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Not processed AllProduct( "Processing", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Processing AllProduct("Shipped", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Shipped AllProduct( "Delivered", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Delivered AllProduct( "Cancelled", data, dispatch, dropdown, setDropdown ) } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-black text-center cursor-pointer" > Cancelled
); }; export default ProductMenu;
